entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
